title: it went viral
description:
by PlasticStars

Kirishima finds out about #GroundRiot on Twitter. He proceeds to share it to Bakugou. Chaos ensues.

Words: 2979, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Kirishima Eijirou, Kaminari Denki, Ashido Mina, Sero Hanta, Shinsou Hitoshi
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, Minor or Background Relationship(s)
  • Additional Tags: Social Media, Twitter, Shipping, Fangirls, Basically the two’s reactions to them being shipped, inappropriate use of lenny faces, what are some actually normal things I can tag this as?, Dating, Prank Wars

blog.description: bnha x reader// voltron KACXA CONTENT ONLY SRYNOTSRY// mlb// some other shit too i guess// REQUESTS ARE ALWAYS OPEN!!

summary: hiya! can I have a request for Baku x Fem!or Gender Neutral reader? maybe a scenario where Bakugo and reader have been dating...
question: hiya! can I have a request for Baku x Fem!or Gender Neutral reader? maybe a scenario where Bakugo and reader have been dating for a while but have never gone to her house or dorm. they decide to get together and when he goes to their house he sees their pet snake- and they go; guess I’ve never mentioned my snake before... maybe some fluff on how the reader allows him to hold it and all? sorry if it’s oddly specific- but please and thank you! ❤️❤️
answer:
Okay this one was by far my favourite request because I fucking love lizards and snakes and I’m getting a lizard this August so sksksksk

——————————————

Bakugo never expected to find someone who he cared about other than himself. Asking S/o to be his girlfriend was probably the toughest task he had to face in UA. Those two were probably the most famous couple there. Mainly because people were surprised that Bakugo could get with someone as awesome as her. And she could manage to put up with someone as stubborn as him.

Once the dorms were in place, they would spend even more time with eachother. She would visit his dorm as often as possible to either study or cuddle with him.

—————————-

The bell rang, signalling the final lesson had just finished meaning that everyone could pack up and go back to their dorms. S/o was placing her books into her bag, gathering her things. She closed her bag up and headed for the door. She stopped in her tracks when she felt a warm hand grab her wrist, “Oi.” She recognised the voice, turning around to face her boyfriend.

“What’s up.” She smiled

He pulled her towards him, sitting on top of a random desk and holding her hips in his hands, looking up to her e/c eyes. “How about I come over and we order some pizza hm?”

She smiled at his soft behaviour, only ever acting like this around her. “Okay.” She pecked his forehead. “I’ll see you at 5.”

———————————-

Bakugo walked down the corridor, checking his phone again to see which dorm it was. This would be the first time Bakugo had ever been to his girlfriends dorm, despite the fact that they had been dating for a few months now. He was interested to see how it looked and how she had decorated it.

His thoughts were interrupted when he started hearing yelling coming down from further down the hall. He stopped for a moment to see if he could hear it again. Surely enough the yelling continued along with loud cursing. “What the fuck?” He whispered to himself. He walked down quietly to investigate some more.

As he got closer, the yelling never stopped. Soon enough he realised that it was coming from his girlfriends room.

“SHIT! FUCKING STOP!” Bakugo stopped, stunned at her words. What could she be possibly be yelling at?

He figured he wait outside her door and listen carefully for any danger. He pressed his ear onto her door and waited for anything else.

“OW STOP IT! IM TRYING TO LOVE YOU!”

Love? The fuck could she be on about?

“STOP FUCKING AROUND YOU BASTARD IM TRYING TO TAKE CARE OF YOU DAMMIT!”

Bakugo had it. He couldn’t stand not knowing what the fuck was going on on the other side of the door. He gripped the handle tightly and turned it, pushing the door open.

Whatever he was assuming was going on he was dead wrong. He saw his s/o hovering over a glass enclosure, holding a pair of tweezers with a dead mouse on it. In the enclosure was a western hognose snake, it’s head peaking out from the top of the enclosure, hissing at s/o.

She turned to face him, shock in her eyes as she was exposed in such an awkward position in front of her boyfriend. An awkward smile formed on her face as she laughed nervously. “Hey baby. What’s good?” She said attempting to make the situation a little less awkward.

“What the hell s/o?” He cocked his brow, slowly walking into her room.

“Oh, I guess I forgot to tell you about my snake.” She giggled.

She placed the tweezers down onto the side of the enclosure. The dead mouse still placed in between the tweezers.

She reached into the enclosure to grab the snake, her hands slowly reaching down to pick him up. The snake however wasn’t having it. It began to lash at her fingers, hissing over and over again. “WILL YOU CALM DOWN! BAKUGO JUST WANTS TO SAY HELLO!”

Bakugo was taken aback by her anger. She was always so calm and laid back so seeing her this angry with something so small seemed weird to him.

Seeing her snake lash out so much scared Bakugo a little. He didn’t know if it was venomous or not but seeing the way s/o was handling it, he figured it was okay. Still, he wasn’t going to take any chances. “Does it bite?” He asked

“No.” She said, she flinched as her snake bite her finger. “He doesn’t bite.” She held him in her hand, holding it up as the snake began to wrap itself around her forearm, it’s head standing out from the rest of its body as it turned to face s/o. Leaning up to make eye contact with her. She pulled her arm closer to her face to inspect it some more, which resulted in the hognose lashing at her some more, causing her to jerk her head back every time. “Cute isn’t he?” She laughed.

“You stupid or something? It’s trying to attack you.” He stayed in his spot. Growing more afraid of the snake however, he was impressed by the way she was handling him so well. Unfazed by it’s violent manner.

“Give me your arm.” She stated.

Bakugo pulled away for a second, although he trusted his girlfriend, he did not trust the hissy pissed off worm that would strike anything in its sight. He looked at his girlfriend with his brows raised, showing her very clearly how insane she looked right now. “Fuck no! That thing is ready to eat you.” “Katsuki you’re being a pussy.” She yanked his arm forward without warning, holding it close to the snake. Bakugo leaned his body back a bit however, he let her guide his arm to the snake.

The snake slowly hovered over Bakugo’s forearm, almost as if it was inspecting him, sticking out his tongue every so often. Bakugo felt at ease, it didn’t seem that bad but not a second later, the snake lashed at him aswell, resulting Bakugo to let out a yelp and pull his arm away immediately. S/o began crying with laughter, tears forming on her eyes as she put the snake back. “Oh my god! Bakugo! That was too funny!” She placed the snake down and was recovering from her laughing fit. Putting her head in her hands to hide her red face. Bakugo on the other hand, was beyond pissed. “Go ahead and fucking laugh you weirdo, that shit nearly bit me.” “Yeah but it was funny.” She spat back. “You’re a dumbass” he scoffed, crossing his arms. He leant on her door, looking away from her with embarrassment. S/o noticed how awkward he looked, it was funny but she couldn’t help but feel a little bad for laughing. She let out a sigh, picking up the tweezers and putting the mouse down into the snakes cage, earning one last pissed off hiss from the snake, resulting in a quick and yet serious “shut up” from s/o. She looked over at her boyfriend, who was still looking at the floor with a small pout on his face. Walking over to him, she poked his cheek lovingly and giggled. “My second favourite pissed off baby.” She cooed. “the fuck do you mean second?!”

——————————————

Bakugo never expected to find someone who he cared about other than himself. Asking S/o to be his girlfriend was probably the toughest task he had to face in UA. Those two were probably the most famous couple there. Mainly because people were surprised that Bakugo could get with someone as awesome as her. And she could manage to put up with someone as stubborn as him.

Once the dorms were in place, they would spend even more time with eachother. She would visit his dorm as often as possible to either study or cuddle with him.

—————————-

The bell rang, signalling the final lesson had just finished meaning that everyone could pack up and go back to their dorms. S/o was placing her books into her bag, gathering her things. She closed her bag up and headed for the door. She stopped in her tracks when she felt a warm hand grab her wrist, “Oi.” She recognised the voice, turning around to face her boyfriend.

“What’s up.” She smiled

He pulled her towards him, sitting on top of a random desk and holding her hips in his hands, looking up to her e/c eyes. “How about I come over and we order some pizza hm?”

She smiled at his soft behaviour, only ever acting like this around her. “Okay.” She pecked his forehead. “I’ll see you at 5.”

———————————-

Bakugo walked down the corridor, checking his phone again to see which dorm it was. This would be the first time Bakugo had ever been to his girlfriends dorm, despite the fact that they had been dating for a few months now. He was interested to see how it looked and how she had decorated it.

His thoughts were interrupted when he started hearing yelling coming down from further down the hall. He stopped for a moment to see if he could hear it again. Surely enough the yelling continued along with loud cursing. “What the fuck?” He whispered to himself. He walked down quietly to investigate some more.

As he got closer, the yelling never stopped. Soon enough he realised that it was coming from his girlfriends room.

“SHIT! FUCKING STOP!” Bakugo stopped, stunned at her words. What could she be possibly be yelling at?

He figured he wait outside her door and listen carefully for any danger. He pressed his ear onto her door and waited for anything else.

“OW STOP IT! IM TRYING TO LOVE YOU!”

Love? The fuck could she be on about?

“STOP FUCKING AROUND YOU BASTARD IM TRYING TO TAKE CARE OF YOU DAMMIT!”

Bakugo had it. He couldn’t stand not knowing what the fuck was going on on the other side of the door. He gripped the handle tightly and turned it, pushing the door open.

Whatever he was assuming was going on he was dead wrong. He saw his s/o hovering over a glass enclosure, holding a pair of tweezers with a dead mouse on it. In the enclosure was a western hognose snake, it’s head peaking out from the top of the enclosure, hissing at s/o.

She turned to face him, shock in her eyes as she was exposed in such an awkward position in front of her boyfriend. An awkward smile formed on her face as she laughed nervously. “Hey baby. What’s good?” She said attempting to make the situation a little less awkward.

“What the hell s/o?” He cocked his brow, slowly walking into her room.

“Oh, I guess I forgot to tell you about my snake.” She giggled.

She placed the tweezers down onto the side of the enclosure. The dead mouse still placed in between the tweezers.

She reached into the enclosure to grab the snake, her hands slowly reaching down to pick him up. The snake however wasn’t having it. It began to lash at her fingers, hissing over and over again. “WILL YOU CALM DOWN! BAKUGO JUST WANTS TO SAY HELLO!”

Bakugo was taken aback by her anger. She was always so calm and laid back so seeing her this angry with something so small seemed weird to him.

Seeing her snake lash out so much scared Bakugo a little. He didn’t know if it was venomous or not but seeing the way s/o was handling it, he figured it was okay. Still, he wasn’t going to take any chances. “Does it bite?” He asked

“No.” She said, she flinched as her snake bite her finger. “He doesn’t bite.” She held him in her hand, holding it up as the snake began to wrap itself around her forearm, it’s head standing out from the rest of its body as it turned to face s/o. Leaning up to make eye contact with her. She pulled her arm closer to her face to inspect it some more, which resulted in the hognose lashing at her some more, causing her to jerk her head back every time. “Cute isn’t he?” She laughed.

“You stupid or something? It’s trying to attack you.” He stayed in his spot. Growing more afraid of the snake however, he was impressed by the way she was handling him so well. Unfazed by it’s violent manner.

“Give me your arm.” She stated.

Bakugo pulled away for a second, although he trusted his girlfriend, he did not trust the hissy pissed off worm that would strike anything in its sight. He looked at his girlfriend with his brows raised, showing her very clearly how insane she looked right now. “Fuck no! That thing is ready to eat you.” “Katsuki you’re being a pussy.” She yanked his arm forward without warning, holding it close to the snake. Bakugo leaned his body back a bit however, he let her guide his arm to the snake.

The snake slowly hovered over Bakugo’s forearm, almost as if it was inspecting him, sticking out his tongue every so often. Bakugo felt at ease, it didn’t seem that bad but not a second later, the snake lashed at him aswell, resulting Bakugo to let out a yelp and pull his arm away immediately. S/o began crying with laughter, tears forming on her eyes as she put the snake back. “Oh my god! Bakugo! That was too funny!” She placed the snake down and was recovering from her laughing fit. Putting her head in her hands to hide her red face. Bakugo on the other hand, was beyond pissed. “Go ahead and fucking laugh you weirdo, that shit nearly bit me.” “Yeah but it was funny.” She spat back. “You’re a dumbass” he scoffed, crossing his arms. He leant on her door, looking away from her with embarrassment. S/o noticed how awkward he looked, it was funny but she couldn’t help but feel a little bad for laughing. She let out a sigh, picking up the tweezers and putting the mouse down into the snakes cage, earning one last pissed off hiss from the snake, resulting in a quick and yet serious “shut up” from s/o. She looked over at her boyfriend, who was still looking at the floor with a small pout on his face. Walking over to him, she poked his cheek lovingly and giggled. “My second favourite pissed off baby.” She cooed. “the fuck do you mean second?!”

summary: Symbol of Love - Chapter 9 - Indrel - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
title: Symbol of Love - Chapter 9 - Indrel - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapter 9 of Symbol of Love is finally out!

All Might had been on patrol through Tokyo all day. For most of the time it had gone by without any fuss. Just some petty crime here and there and when the criminals saw All Might coming towards them most just immediately gave up. Frankly he could have left them to some of the other heroes. Probably should have even but All Might could never not respond to a cry for help.

At worst he’d had some robberies. One attempted assault. They had all ended within seconds of him arriving. Nothing serious. Though the victims were all very grateful and that made it worth it. The media had been a bigger nuance frankly, though he could handle them too.

One message from Nighteye changed everything.

tags: my spanish was like: owo? in this
summary: I'd love a BNHA matchup! I'm a 5'3" straight girl, ENFJ-T, Slytherpuff, ambivert,Taurus with Scorpio rising, and curvy. i enjoy...
question: I'd love a BNHA matchup! I'm a 5'3" straight girl, ENFJ-T, Slytherpuff, ambivert,Taurus with Scorpio rising, and curvy. i enjoy edm/hip hop dancing to unwind occasionally, work hard making cosplay/Etsy crafts to support myself, and love absurd/self-deprecating humor and making people laugh. I'm working on staying present to get out of my own head, and tend to Bakurage when around bad driving/stupidity. Touch starved but trepidatious about it. I love my cat, good storytelling, and genuine people!
answer:
i apologise for this being so late! my exams are over on tuesday so after tuesday i’m gonna be writing a lot! i’ve got a todoroki piece in the works and i might make it into a longer story but i’m not too sure yet (´～｀ヾ) anywho, enjoy!

for a boy, i’d match you up with denki kaminari! kaminari is quite literally, one of the most goofiest and dorkiest boys you will come across — i can guarantee you that much! he’s the sort of guy who wouldn’t particularly judge his s/o since, you know, he literally EATS CABLES to DRY HIS HAIR. all i’m saying is denki what are you doing sweaty who do i need to call. so the fact you enjoy dancing is literally the cutest thing ever to him?? he’d literally dance with you in your dorm room or his own for literal hours he loves it so much??

AIDBHFF MAKING DRAWINGS FOR HIS ROOM!! YOU BET HE’LL PIN THEM ALL UP!! OR KEEP THEM ALL IN A SPECIAL BOX!! when you make arts and crafts he literally cries a little he thinks it’s so cute and adorable wow his s/o really is the cutest thing ever HUH. he would so join you in doing it and you two would just tell the most weirdest jokes and start laughing your asses off do i need to say more. he’ll try and beat you at everything or annoy you to see you bakurage and sero’s just like KAMINARI STOP IT’S FOUR IN THE MORNING PL— :aggressive sobbing:

he would literally cuddle you ALL THE TIME and just tell you random things whilst playing with your hair?? like he’ll be twirling your hair around his fingers and kissing your temple and before you know it he’s talking about something so absurd and you just laugh because wow your boyfriend really does radiate hugest dork to exist energy

WHEN YOU TWO GET OLDER YOU ADOPT A CAT!!!! and it’s called luna (spanish for moon (⌒_⌒;) and luna always comes into your room at night and cuddles with you two IT’A THE CUTEST THING!! that’s until you get a golden labrador called estrella (spanish for star ヽ(〃ｖ〃)ノ ) but you two still love estrella!! denki always takes her out for walks and wow he’s just so cute and adorable and he loves you it’s just THE CUTEST!! THING!! TO!! EXIST!!

blog.description: My A03 has lots of erasermic stuff! ~ Call me Inks! (My main blog is xxinksxx) They/Them//29//AroAceAgen I have no excuse tbh I'm just here to scream about my favorites and launch myself into the sun

summary: Aizawa feels unlovable because of a mistake at work that caused someone to die/get hurt and mic is there reminding him why his...
question: Aizawa feels unlovable because of a mistake at work that caused someone to die/get hurt and mic is there reminding him why his isn't unlovable
answer:
Hizashi smacked Aizawa in the face with a pillow.

“Get up,” he instructed. I need to show you something important.

“Mic, I don’t feel like doing this right now,” Aizawa sighed, snatching the pillow back and burying his face under it. 

“Too bad,” Hizashi declared loudly. “Can’t wait.” He began patting the blanket all over Aizawa in a steady, annoying rhythm. “Up up up and at ‘em yo!” 

“Fine! Just stop!” Aizawa snapped.

“Are you getting up?” Hizashi asked, not ceasing until Aizawa was sitting up and swatting at him irritably. 

“Why do you keep bothering me?” Aizawa snapped. “Why can’t you just let me sort through this by myself?”

“Because it’s been three days and all you’ve done is lay in bed and convince yourself you’re the worst human being on earth. And I’m here to show you that’s the farthest thing from the truth,” Hizashi replied.

“Save your breath,” Aizawa mumbled. “I’m not worth the effort.”

“Au contraire mon ami,” Hizashi said, taking Aizawa’s face in his hands and making him look up. “You are worth every ounce of effort I will ever exude into this life and I will never stop telling you just how amazing you are.”

“Someone got killed because of me Mic,” Aizawa said softly, looking down. “I couldn’t save them.”

“Don’t let the loss of another make you lose yourself,” Hizashi replied just as softly. “You are just as important as the lives you try to save. Even if you can’t save them all, that doesn’t drop your worth. You are still allowed to live. Still allowed to laugh and cry. Still allowed to take care of yourself and the students you won’t admit you hold very dear. You’re allowed to live, Shouta. Even if it’s just for yourself. But if that isn’t enough, then live for me. Live and be the happiest you can be because you know it makes me happy.”

Shouta let his words sink in for a long moment. 

“Cocky,” he muttered, though he was trying to hide the small blush across his face. “If I were to live for you, would you have me build you a shrine too?”

“Get out of bed so I can show you what a decent and amazing human being you are, jackass!” Hizashi bristled. He shoved the pillow in Aizawa’s face again, who grinned into the fluff.

“Wait oh great Presento Miku!” he called after Hizashi who stomped out of the room. “I’m not done worshiping you!”

“Shouta I swear to god!” he called.

“Because it’s been three days and all you’ve done is lay in bed and convince yourself you’re the worst human being on earth. And I’m here to show you that’s the farthest thing from the truth,” Hizashi replied.

“Save your breath,” Aizawa mumbled. “I’m not worth the effort.”

“Au contraire mon ami,” Hizashi said, taking Aizawa’s face in his hands and making him look up. “You are worth every ounce of effort I will ever exude into this life and I will never stop telling you just how amazing you are.”

“Someone got killed because of me Mic,” Aizawa said softly, looking down. “I couldn’t save them.”

“Don’t let the loss of another make you lose yourself,” Hizashi replied just as softly. “You are just as important as the lives you try to save. Even if you can’t save them all, that doesn’t drop your worth. You are still allowed to live. Still allowed to laugh and cry. Still allowed to take care of yourself and the students you won’t admit you hold very dear. You’re allowed to live, Shouta. Even if it’s just for yourself. But if that isn’t enough, then live for me. Live and be the happiest you can be because you know it makes me happy.”

Shouta let his words sink in for a long moment. 

“Cocky,” he muttered, though he was trying to hide the small blush across his face. “If I were to live for you, would you have me build you a shrine too?”

“Get out of bed so I can show you what a decent and amazing human being you are, jackass!” Hizashi bristled. He shoved the pillow in Aizawa’s face again, who grinned into the fluff.

“Wait oh great Presento Miku!” he called after Hizashi who stomped out of the room. “I’m not done worshiping you!”

“Shouta I swear to god!” he called.

trail.content_raw:
Hizashi smacked Aizawa in the face with a pillow.

“Get up,” he instructed. I need to show you something important.

“Mic, I don’t feel like doing this right now,” Aizawa sighed, snatching the pillow back and burying his face under it. 

“Too bad,” Hizashi declared loudly. “Can’t wait.” He began patting the blanket all over Aizawa in a steady, annoying rhythm. “Up up up and at ‘em yo!” 

“Fine! Just stop!” Aizawa snapped.

“Are you getting up?” Hizashi asked, not ceasing until Aizawa was sitting up and swatting at him irritably. 

“Why do you keep bothering me?” Aizawa snapped. “Why can’t you just let me sort through this by myself?”

“Because it’s been three days and all you’ve done is lay in bed and convince yourself you’re the worst human being on earth. And I’m here to show you that’s the farthest thing from the truth,” Hizashi replied.

“Save your breath,” Aizawa mumbled. “I’m not worth the effort.”

“Someone got killed because of me Mic,” Aizawa said softly, looking down. “I couldn’t save them.”

“Don’t let the loss of another make you lose yourself,” Hizashi replied just as softly. “You are just as important as the lives you try to save. Even if you can’t save them all, that doesn’t drop your worth. You are still allowed to live. Still allowed to laugh and cry. Still allowed to take care of yourself and the students you won’t admit you hold very dear. You’re allowed to live, Shouta. Even if it’s just for yourself. But if that isn’t enough, then live for me. Live and be the happiest you can be because you know it makes me happy.”

Shouta let his words sink in for a long moment. 

“Cocky,” he muttered, though he was trying to hide the small blush across his face. “If I were to live for you, would you have me build you a shrine too?”

“Get out of bed so I can show you what a decent and amazing human being you are, jackass!” Hizashi bristled. He shoved the pillow in Aizawa’s face again, who grinned into the fluff.

“Wait oh great Presento Miku!” he called after Hizashi who stomped out of the room. “I’m not done worshiping you!”

“Shouta I swear to god!” he called.
